body: Carmelo, Yes, the Solar Adjusted Temperature component can be used both indoors and outdoors (as can the microclimate maps).  For the indoors, make sure that your baseTemperature is an MRT value and set _baseDryBulbOrMRT_ to False.  You should not have to plug in an values for _horizInfraredRad_ in this case.
